title: Doctor Who - BF105A - Cuddlesome (2008) - iPod Audiobook
description:
Doctor Who - BF105A - Cuddlesome (2008) - iPod Audiobook

Cuddlesome is a Big Finish Productions audio drama based on the long-running British science fiction television series Doctor Who. It was released free on CD with issue 393 of Doctor Who Magazine in March 2008. 

Originally written by Nigel Fairs and released on Audio cassette in 1989. It was episode 22 during the 4th and final series of an unauthorized production of 27 Doctor Who adventures
called the "Audio Visuals", not licensed by the BBC.  In the 1989 release The Doctor was played by Nick Briggs of todays Big Finish.  Nick&#039;s role in this 2008 release is much smaller, as just the voice of a TV newscaster. 

 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Audio_Visuals" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Audio_Visuals</a>


Plot
The Cuddlesomes - pink vampire hamsters from the 1980s. For so long now the Cuddlesomes have been forgotten, lying in attics and junk shops. But now they&#039;re waking up. And they want to give a whole generation a long, slow, deadly cuddle.


Cast
The Doctor - Peter Davison 
Angela Wisher - Roberta Taylor 
Ronald Turvey - Timothy West 
The Tinghus - David Troughton 
John Dixon - Matthew Noble 
Miranda Evenden - Kate Brown 
Newsreader - Nicholas Briggs 
New Cuddlesomes - Matthew Noble 
Cuddlesomes / Dr Cooper / Vehicle - Kate Brown
